Actions.Name: Add custom Bitlink
Actions.Description: Add a keyword (or custom back-half) to a Bitlink with a Custom Domain. This endpoint can also be used for initial redirects to a link.

Actions.Name: Bulk add Bitlinks to channels
Actions.Description: Bulk add Bitlinks to multiple campaign channels

Actions.Name: Create Bitlink
Actions.Description: Converts a long URL to a Bitlink.

Actions.Name: Create campaign
Actions.Description: Creates a new campaign.

Actions.Name: Create channel
Actions.Description: Creates a new channel.

Actions.Name: Create full Bitlink
Actions.Description: Converts a long URL to a Bitlink and sets additional parameters.

Actions.Name: Create webhook
Actions.Description: Creates a webhook.

Actions.Name: Delete webhook
Actions.Description: Deletes a webhook.

Actions.Name: Expand Bitlink
Actions.Description: Returns the short link and long URL for the specified link.

Actions.Name: Get Bitlink
Actions.Description: Returns information for the specified link.

Actions.Name: Get Bitlink QR code
Actions.Description: Generates a QR code for a Bitlink.

Actions.Name: Get Bitlinks by group
Actions.Description: Returns a paginated collection of Bitlinks for a group.

Actions.Name: Get BSDs
Actions.Description: Fetch all Branded Short Domains.

Actions.Name: Get campaign
Actions.Description: Returns details for a campaign.

Actions.Name: Get campaigns
Actions.Description: Returns the campaigns for the current authenticated user.

Actions.Name: Get channel
Actions.Description: Returns a channel's details.

Actions.Name: Get channels
Actions.Description: Returns the channels available to a user.

Actions.Name: Get clicks for Bitlink
Actions.Description: Returns the click counts for the specified link in an array based on a date.

Actions.Name: Get clicks for custom Bitlink
Actions.Description: Returns the click counts for the specified link. This returns an array with clicks based on a date.

Actions.Name: Get clicks summary for Bitlink
Actions.Description: Returns the click counts for the specified link rolled up into a single field.

Actions.Name: Get custom Bitlink
Actions.Description: Returns the details and history of the specified link.

Actions.Name: Get custom Bitlink metrics by destination
Actions.Description: Returns click metrics for the specified link by its historical destinations.

Actions.Name: Get custom Bitlinks for BSDs
Actions.Description: Gets custom Bitlinks for an organization filtered by BSD(s).

Actions.Name: Get group
Actions.Description: Returns details for a group.

Actions.Name: Get group clicks
Actions.Description: Get number of clicks on Bitlinks in a group.

Actions.Name: Get group metrics by cities
Actions.Description: Returns the geographic origins of click traffic by city for the specified group.

Actions.Name: Get group metrics by countries
Actions.Description: Returns the geographic origins of click traffic by country for the specified group.

Actions.Name: Get group metrics by devices
Actions.Description: Returns the device types generating click traffic to the specified group's links.

Actions.Name: Get group metrics by referring networks
Actions.Description: Returns metrics by referring networks for the specified group's links.

Actions.Name: Get group preferences
Actions.Description: Returns preferences for the specified group.

Actions.Name: Get groups
Actions.Description: Returns a list of groups in the organization.

Actions.Name: Get group shorten counts
Actions.Description: Returns all the shorten counts for a group.

Actions.Name: Get group tags
Actions.Description: Returns the tags currently used in the specified group. Maximum 1000.

Actions.Name: Get metrics for Bitlink by cities
Actions.Description: Returns the city origins of click traffic for the specified link.

Actions.Name: Get metrics for Bitlink by countries
Actions.Description: Returns the country origins of click traffic for the specified link.

Actions.Name: Get metrics for Bitlink by devices
Actions.Description: Returns the device types generating click traffic to the specified link.

Actions.Name: Get metrics for Bitlink by referrers
Actions.Description: Returns referrer click counts for the specified link.

Actions.Name: Get metrics for Bitlink by referrers by domains
Actions.Description: Returns click metrics grouped by referrers for the specified link.

Actions.Name: Get metrics for Bitlink by referring domains
Actions.Description: Returns the referring domain click counts for the specified link.

Actions.Name: Get OAuth App
Actions.Description: Retrieve the details for the provided OAuth App client ID.

Actions.Name: Get organization
Actions.Description: Retrieve details for the specified organization.

Actions.Name: Get organizations
Actions.Description: Retrieve a list of organizations.

Actions.Name: Get organization shorten counts
Actions.Description: Returns the shorten counts for a specific organization over a specified time period.

Actions.Name: Get plan limits
Actions.Description: Returns all plan limits and counts available for an organization.

Actions.Name: Get platform limits
Actions.Description: Fetch all platform limits and counts available for an organization

Actions.Name: Get sorted Bitlinks
Actions.Description: Returns a list of Bitlinks sorted by group.

Actions.Name: Get user
Actions.Description: Returns information for the current authenticated user.

Actions.Name: Get webhook
Actions.Description: Returns a webhook.

Actions.Name: Get webhooks
Actions.Description: Fetch all webhooks available for an Organization

Actions.Name: Update Bitlink
Actions.Description: Updates fields in the specified link.

Actions.Name: Update Bitlinks by group
Actions.Description: Bulk update can add or remove tags or archive up to 100 links at a time; The response includes a a list of Bitlink ids that were updated.

Actions.Name: Update campaign
Actions.Description: Updates a campaign's details.

Actions.Name: Update channel
Actions.Description: Updates an existing channel.

Actions.Name: Update custom Bitlink
Actions.Description: Move a keyword (or custom back-half) to a different Bitlink.

Actions.Name: Update group
Actions.Description: Updates the details of a group.

Actions.Name: Update group preferences
Actions.Description: Updates preferences for a group.

Actions.Name: Update user
Actions.Description: Update fields in the user

Actions.Name: Update webhook
Actions.Description: Update a webhook

Actions.Name: Verify webhook
Actions.Description: Sends ping event to test webhook configuration.
